Hair.Name: Long Chunky Black Braids
Hair.Description: Chunky box braids are totally in style. With alternating thin braids, the hairdo feels very hot

Hair.Name: Messy Spikes with Low Fade

Hair.Name: Criss-Cross Goddess Braids
Hair.Description: Cornrow hairstyles look more natural and less bulky by creating a narrow and flat point at the hairline

Hair.Name: Messy Hawk for Women
Hair.Description: today’s mohawks are much cooler than this and are ideal for both men and women. Long and messy is a fun new way to update the classic Mohawk concept

Hair.Name: Temple Fade for Natural Hair
Hair.Description: This men’s cut is a great choice if you want to have short and manageable hair with natural texture

Hair.Description: his haircut is ideal for those who don’t want to put a lot of time and effort into their look

Hair.Name: Braided Ponytail
Hair.Description: A cornrow ponytail is great for a casual updo that won’t pull on your edges

Hair.Name: Designed Mohawk Hair

Hair.Name: Smart Style
Hair.Description: The smart boys cut is extremely versatile and can be styled with lightweight smoothing

Hair.Name: Buzz Cut with High Fade
Hair.Description: For the bearded guys out there, have your hair fade out near your temples and fade back in towards the jawline

Hair.Name: Curly Hairstyle with Crochet Braids
Hair.Description: . You can wear the hair down or up in a ponytail

Hair.Name: Half Cornrows Half Individual Braids
Hair.Description: Braided hairstyles for black women are very creative and versatile

Hair.Name: Heartbeat Babe
Hair.Description: Mohawk hairstyles that will get your heart racing, try the style donning the heartbeat symbol

Hair.Name: Braided Tower
Hair.Description: This is a style that will work perfectly for the lucky ones with thick, coarse hair that stays in place

Hair.Name: Textured Hairstyle for Fine Hair
Hair.Description: full of texture and movement, perfect for men who seek a current style with short styling time

Hair.Name: Bed Head Honey
Hair.Description: low maintenance kind of gal, this is the mohawk that will take you from the sheets to the streets

Hair.Name: Upside Down Braids to Bun
Hair.Description: Super sleek and bold, go with upright braids. Have the cornrows lead into either a ponytail or a bun

Hair.Name: Triangle Box Braids

Hair.Name: Glamorous Mohawk Updo

Hair.Name: Micro Twist Ponytail

Hair.Name: Rebellious Hairstyle for Curly Hair

Pedicures.Name: French Pedicure
Pedicures.Description: First, a clear or nude base coat is applied, followed by a solid white colored nail polish

Pedicures.Name: Gel Pedicure
Pedicures.Description: What makes it special and different however is the UV light that is used to help cure the gel or nail paint after each coating

Pedicures.Name: Paraffin Pedicure
Pedicures.Description: feet are dipped into paraffin wax which helps immensely in softening and moisturizing skin.

Pedicures.Name: Hot Stone Pedicure
Pedicures.Description: The method follows a regular pedicure routine followed by body polish on the feet and legs. The mask sits under a warm towel for five minutes to provide that steam therapy

Pedicures.Name: Fish Pedicure
Pedicures.Description: In this, you will be dipping your feet in an aquarium filled with tiny fish.he fish will swarm around your feet and eat away all the dirt and dead skin cells that were sticking around

Pedicures.Name: Salt Pedicure
Pedicures.Description: It uses salt and rock to successfully scrub off dead skin to reveal newer cells. This step replaces other exfoliation processes in this pedicure

Pedicures.Name: Margarita Pedicure
Pedicures.Description: he margarita pedicure does not exactly involve a margarita, but a lime footbath, a salt scrub, a lime-based massage oil and lime-scented moisturizer

Pedicures.Name: Chocolate Pedicure
Pedicures.Description: IFor those obsessed with chocolate, this pedicure is a dream-come-true. Every single procedure and product used in this treatment is derived from the world of cocoa. It has everything from a chocolate foot soak to a cocoa moisturizing lotion

Manicures.Name: Basic Polish
Manicures.Description: Paint it on yourself or hit up your manicure spot for a pristine application (complete with hand massage, might we add)

Manicures.Name: Shellac
Manicures.Description: t’s basically a hybrid of gel and nail polish that’s cured and hardened with a UV light

Manicures.Name: Acrylic
Manicures.Description: It’s a combination of a liquid and powder that creates a hard protective layer over your natural nail and false tips. The mixture hardens from exposure to air and creates a transparent canvas for regular nail polish

Manicures.Name: Dip Powder
Manicures.Description: etween base coats and a sealant, you dip your nails into a little jar of your chosen color. The powder will only stick to the sealant, so it leaves less room for messy cuticles

Manicures.Name: Paraffin manicure
Manicures.Description: involves dipping your hand in paraffin wax—a colorless, odorless wax derived from beeswax and petroleum—and placing them in plastic gloves and wrapping in a hot towel

Other Services.Name: Massage
Other Services.Description: the rubbing and kneading of muscles and joints of the body with the hands, especially to relieve tension or pain

Other Services.Name: Facials
Other Services.Description: amily of skin care treatments for the face, including steam, exfoliation, extraction, creams, lotions, facial masks, peels, and massage

Other Services.Name: Tanning
Other Services.Description: the action or activity of exposing one's skin to the sun in order to achieve a brown or darkened colour.
